author: Jimmy Rodriguez
title: 3dcart Announces the Official Launch of their New eCommerce Platform, Version 7.0
text:
The largest, most innovative eCommerce update of 2015 has launched worldwide, prompting a surge of positive user and industry feedback. 3dcart, an all in-one-one eCommerce solution , has released version 7.0 – a completely redesigned, edge-cutting platform that boasts user efficiency, high speed and advanced technological capabilities. As the preferred eCommerce platform of choice for tens of thousands of businesses across the globe, 3dcart’s latest update implements new trends and technologies to provide the most comprehensive, advanced platform ever available to internet retailers. After months of dedicated development and the inclusion of countless customer requests, 3dcart’s new platform has released with an array of new and improved features, including but not limited to a completely redesigned Control Panel & Dashboard, a built-in Point-of-Sale system, REST API, multi-channel selling, native support for Visa Checkout and a new Checkout Experience. Furthermore, the new platform was built for responsiveness and flexibility, making it easier for online retailers to take advantages of these features anytime, anywhere -- whether on a desktop or a tablet.
7.0 users will additionally benefit from a colossal update to 3dcart’s core infrastructure. Performance has been upgraded and optimized, with the platform now able to handle massive influxes to traffic and 240 sales per second. An overhaul to the frontend template system also ensures that in addition to optimum performance, users will have access to over a hundred Responsive and Mobile-Friendly themes, a critical element in any business’ success since the rise of Google’s “Mobilegeddon.”
"3dcart’s version 7 is more than just a version update to our ecommerce solution," said COO Jimmy Rodriguez. "It's an entirely new, groundbreaking platform, thoroughly rebuilt from the ground up after almost 2 years of research and feedback from small and large retailers worldwide."
3dcart 7 is the most powerful, scalable, fastest hosted eCommerce platform yet; the ideal solution for any internet retailer, regardless of their stage in the lifecycle of a business. Introducing a new level of service for high-volume businesses, the company now offers their Enterprise eCommerce Solution , a service that eliminates the expensive fees associated with third-party and customized eCommerce software. 7.0 marks a new age and a promising future for the entire eCommerce industry.
For more information about 3dcart, visit http://www.3dcart.com/startnow
About 3dcart
3dcart ( http://www.3dcart.com ), located in Tamarac, Florida, is an All-in-One eCommerce solution for retailers to build, promote and grow their online stores. 3dcart's services include the best Technical Support in the industry, 100+ Mobile-Ready Themes featuring the latest technology, order management software, blog, email marketing tools and more. Since 1997, the company has been a leader in the eCommerce market, building online stores for businesses of all sizes. Today, 3dcart supports over 17,000 retailers, is Visa PCI Certified and a Google Certified Partner.
